text.description:
In today's video, we are on a trip to Washington DC and wanted to do a restaurant review at a few restaurants in Washington DC. One of these restaurant is called The Hamilton. The Hamilton restaurant in Washington DC seems to be a very popular spot. We are glad we got a reservation because there were a ton of people. Inside the restaurant, it is really cool and huge. It goes way back and has multiple levels. The way it is decorated and the design inside is top notch. The menu is good. The drink menu is huge. However, the major complaint we had was the amount of time it took to get anything. It took a very long time to get an appetizer. It took a long time to get refills. It took an extremely long time to get our food. We ended up being in that restaurant for over 2 hours. This was our biggest complaint and the main reason we said we wouldn’t go back. As far as the food tastes, it was good. Really didn’t have any complaints on the taste or quality of food. The sole reason as to why we wouldn’t go back was the wait. If they can cut the time down to an hour, it would be worth a visit. Overall, The Hamilton is a really nice restaurant in Washington DC and if they can work out a few things, it has the potential to be a great spot!
Stay tuned for another video coming soon. Thanks so much for watching! God Bless!!!
If you would like to SUPPORT us on our adventures: https://www.thealtemlife.com/support
If you haven't yet subscribed, and wouldn't mind doing so, that would be great! For additional content, check us out on Facebook, Instagram, and our website.
Our Website: https://www.thealtemlife.com/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thealtemlife Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thealtemlife/ Tember's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/the.tem.life/ Alex's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/the.al.life/ Merchandise: https://www.thealtemlife.com/merchandise#!/all TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thealtemlife?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc
#washington #restaurantreview #washingtondc
